entry.title: Thousands Leave Burning Man After Weekend Mired in Mud
entry.content: Heavy rains trapped tech titans, artists and other free spirits who had flocked to this Nevada desert playa for the annual festival.

entry.title: Deadly Fire Exposes Freedom's Failed Promise in South Africa
entry.content: At least 77 people died in the fire in downtown Johannesburg in the early hours of Thursday morning, all of them Black and among the poorest in the sprawling metropolis christened the City of Gold by its white founders a century and a half ago.
